# stm

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

An R Package.

## Installation

You can install the development version of `stm` from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("DongyueXie/vebpm")
devtools::install_github("DongyueXie/smashrgen")
devtools::install_github("DongyueXie/smashr")
devtools::install_github("DongyueXie/ebpm")
devtools::install_github("DongyueXie/stm")
```
